objects.text:
• Premium pink blush with built-in mirror
• Luxurious silver and black packaging
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color
• Perfect for all skin tones

product_details.name: Pretty in Pink Luxury Makeup Set - Timeless Beauty Essentials
product_details.description:
• Premium pink blush compact with built-in mirror for perfect application on-the-go
• Silky-smooth powder formula for natural, buildable coverage
• Luxurious silver and black packaging for elegant aesthetics
• Matching pink lipstick in sleek silver tube with professional finish
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color coordination
• Professional-grade makeup essentials perfect for daily wear
• Classic black compact design with protective closure
• Travel-friendly size for your purse or makeup bag
• Perfect pink shades suitable for all skin tones
• High-quality mirror for precise application anywhere

banner_details:
This vibrant banner showcases a luxurious makeup promotion centered around a pink aesthetic. The top features a bold headline (`heading`) in vivid pink, establishing the energetic feel of the product. Below it, a clean white subheadline (`subheading`) emphasizes the product type, followed by a soft pink tagline (`tagline`) reinforcing elegance. The value propositions (`description`) are neatly bullet-pointed in white, ensuring clarity. The price (`price`) is displayed prominently in a large pink font near the bottom left. A call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in deep magenta invites clicks. The product image (`product_image`) of pink blush and lipstick is placed on the right. The background (`background`) uses a rich diagonal gradient with starburst and dot patterns adding texture.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: `#2D2D42`
- Violet Maroon: `#3D2D4A`, `#5D2D4A`
- Soft Pink: `#FF9CC2`
- Hot Pink: `#FF69B4`
- Deep Magenta: `#FF1493`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a coordinated cosmetic set with a vibrant yet soft aesthetic. Dominant colors are a gentle bubblegum pink (#F4A6C0) featured in the blush and lipstick, which offers a playful and feminine tone. The sleek black case (#1A1A1A) adds modern contrast and elegance, while the silver lipstick tube (#C0C0C0) presents a reflective, metallic finish for a luxurious feel. The white mirror background (#F8F8F8) maintains brightness and focus on the product. These colors blend smoothly through contrasts—pink draws attention, while black and silver balance the palette. Ideal banner palette: #F4A6C0, #1A1A1A, #C0C0C0, #F8F8F8.
